casebody.data:
Nicholas THOMAS, Appellant,
v.
STATE of Missouri, Respondent. WD 81286 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. Order filed: March 19, 2019
Application for Transfer Denied June 25, 2019 Clark L. Jones, Columbia, for Appellant Mary H. Moore, Jefferson City, for Respondent Before Division Two: Edward R. Ardini, Jr., Presiding Judge, Gary D. Witt, Judge and Thomas N. Chapman, Judge

ORDER

PER CURIAM:

Nicholas Thomas appeals the judgment of the Circuit Court of Boone County denying his Rule 29.15 motion for post-conviction relief. Finding no error, we affirm. Because a published opinion would have no precedential value, we have instead provided a memorandum of law to the parties. Rule 84.16(b).
